description: This sweet, spicy and fragrant chicken soup, called curry mee, is a happy contrast of hot broth, springy noodles and a madness of garnishes Coconut milk has a particular weighty creaminess, called lemak, that can make some curries and soups too rich Here, a combination of coconut milk and half-and-half is used to balance the broth.
title: Coconut Curry Chicken Noodle Soup
title_page: Coconut Curry Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This sweet, spicy and fragrant chicken soup, called curry mee, is a happy contrast of hot broth, springy noodles and a madness of garnishes. Coconut milk has a particular weighty creaminess, called lemak, that can make some curries and soups too rich. Here, a combination of coconut milk and half-and-half is used to balance the broth.
Featured in: From Asia, Rapture In A Bowl.
Learn: How to Make Soup
